attributes.action: I would like to propose a 3rd place playoff in the European Championships.
attributes.additional_details: As like many football fans the summer gap in the Premier League season can be quite boring. Especially when you are a England supporter as they are incapable of winning a knockout game. However with the emergence of Wales as a super power of world football I feel they had deserved a shot at Germany in the third place playoff. Also I had Ashley (The King) Williams & Muller (The Mighty Letdown) in my Dreamteam and only needed a few more points to beat my mates!
attributes.background: I would like the FA to propose to FIFA a third place playoff game in the European Championships. I think Wales deserve it and also my Dreamteam needed a couple more points.
